title: Multi-agent audit of ralphtools v1.4 implementation
description: Run critique-waves with specialized parallel agents: Security Auditor, Style Enforcer, Test Coverage Checker. Use 2-3 iteration cycles with self-refinement. Capture full audit trail in docs.local/.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create docs.local/audit-v1.4/ with instructions.md and tracker.md
Run static analysis first: zsh -n ralph.zsh, shellcheck if available
Agent 1 (Security): Check for hardcoded secrets, command injection, unsafe evals
Agent 2 (Style): Check local vars, function naming, consistent formatting
Agent 3 (Coverage): Verify all new functions have corresponding tests
Run 2-3 iteration cycles (self-refinement per research best practices)
Capture full audit trail with timestamps in tracker.md
Fix issues found, document in wave log
